text: Minute Weight Loss Program
The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program provides its services to you, subject to the Terms and Conditions contained in this Service Agreement.
This is our Service Agreement. If you visit or purchase from The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program, you accept these Terms and Conditions of Use.

All content, products and services are not to be considered as legal or professional advice, and are to be used for personal entertainment purposes only. You use the knowledge provided at your own risk and we are not liable for any negative consequence as a result of following the advice given. Remember, each situation is different and if you feel that the methods in this method do not apply to you, then it is your responsibility to contact us within the 60 day period and seek a refund. We have a very generous money back guarantee to cater situations where our course cannot provide a solution for you.

Please note that results we quoted are not the typical results. In fact, we only highlight and use the best cases as case studies for our marketing material. There are instances where our courses will simply not be able to help you.

We would like to point out there pen names or aliases are used in our marketing material for privacy and anonymity purposes. On occasions where appropriate the services of an actor or fictitious stories will be used in our marketing material or product.

Testimonials have not been independently verified, and some are for demonstrative and illustrative purposes and they merely reflect the opinions and experiences of the creators of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program's products or other products within our product range, and are submitted to The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program voluntarily by customers, ourselves or obtained through compensation. If you would like to submit a testimonial to The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program. You agree that it becomes the exclusive property of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program, which for example includes the rights to reproduce, edit (for length but not general content), and/or publish the testimonial, which may include your name or initials and city/state/country of residence. Some customers that have submitted testimonials may have received a The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program product or service as a "thank you" in appreciation for the time they invested to write or record their testimonials. Thank you!
If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, We will be happy to accept a return within the specified time period for a full refund, within 60 days of your purchase.
This website is not intended to be viewed by minors or anyone under the age of 18. By entering this site, you are agreeing that you are over the age of 18.

If you do not agree to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions, please do not use or access this Website. The contents of this Website, including the text, graphics, images, and information obtained from The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program third-party content providers, sponsors, suppliers, and licensors (collectively "Providers"), and any other materials are to be used for informational purposes only.

You must be 18 years or older to purchase any product or service offered on or through the Website. Some of the content on the Website may not be appropriate for children. CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 13 ARE NOT PERMITTED TO USE THIS WEBSITE. We strongly recommend that children between the ages of 13 and 18 ask for their parent's or guardian's permission before viewing the Website.
Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your visit to the Website, to understand our privacy practices.

When you visit the Website or fill out any online forms, you are communicating with us electronically. You consent to receive communications (including legal notices) from us electronically. We will communicate with you by email, phone, text messages, mail or by posting notices on the Website. You agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing. The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program may also deliver communications to you electronically. In addition, The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program may deliver communications (including legal notices) to you at the street address you provided. Finally, The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program may deliver communications to you by any means set forth in any other The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program policy or notice published on the Website.

The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program grants you a limited license to access and make personal use of the Website and you may not download (other than page caching) or modify it, or any portion of it, without the express written consent of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program . This license does not include any resale or commercial use of the Website or its contents; any collection and use of any product listings, descriptions, or prices; any derivative use of the Website or its contents; or any use of data mining, robots, or similar data gathering and extraction tools. The Website or any portion thereof may not be reproduced, duplicated, copied, sold, resold, or otherwise exploited for any commercial purpose without express written consent of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program .

You may not frame or utilize any framing techniques to enclose any trademark, logo, or other proprietary information (including images, text, page layout, or form) of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program without our express written consent. You may not use any metatags or any other hidden text utilizing The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program name or trademarks without the express written consent of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program . Any unauthorized use terminates the permission or license granted by The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program . You are granted a limited, revocable, and nonexclusive right to create a hyperlink to the home page of the Website so long as the link does not portray The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program , its affiliates, or their products or services in a false, misleading, derogatory, or otherwise offensive manner.
You may not use any The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program logo or other proprietary graphic or trademark as part of the link without express written permission.
You may contact us by filling out the contact us form on our website (please provide your first and last name, and order number if applicable)
section: CONTACTING The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program

The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program does, however, welcome your feedback regarding many areas of The 1 Minute Weight Loss Program's existing business.
